TEXT.TITLE: ATT <ATT> GETS 57.3 MLN DLR CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: American Telephone and Telegraph Co has received a 57.3 mln dlr contract to develop laboratory equipment for an Enhanced Modular Signal Processor, the Navy said. reuter
